Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.view

Class BlurTransition

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.Animation
javafx.animation.Transition
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.view.BlurTransition
public class BlurTransition extends javafx.animation.Transition
The BlurTransition class provides a transition that animates the blurring effect of a given node from a specified start value to an end value.
Since:
April 25, 2023.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Markus Evald Dalbakk

  • Constructor Details

    • BlurTransition

      public BlurTransition(javafx.util.Duration duration, javafx.scene.Node node, double fromValue, double toValue)
      The method creates a BlurTransition object.
      Parameters:
      duration - the duration of the transition.
      node - the node to apply the blurring effect on.
      fromValue - the starting value of the blurring radius.
      toValue - the end value of the blurring radius.
